classrooms.CRDescription: Advanced mathematics course covering algebra, geometry, and calculus fundamentals for 10th grade students.

posts.title: Welcome to Mathematics Class 10th
posts.content: Welcome students! This semester we'll cover advanced topics in algebra and geometry. Please check the syllabus uploaded in assignments section.
posts.author: Priya Sharma

posts.title: Class Schedule Updated
posts.content: New class timings: Monday, Wednesday, Friday - 10:00 AM to 11:30 AM. Please note the change.
posts.author: Priya Sharma

posts.title: Important Notice
posts.content: Mid-term exams will be conducted next week. Please prepare chapters 1-5.
posts.author: Priya Sharma

assignments.title: Mathematics Assignment 1 - Algebra
assignments.description: Complete exercises 1-10 from chapter 2. Solve all quadratic equations and show working steps.

assignments.title: Geometry Project Work
assignments.description: Create a presentation on different types of triangles with real-world examples.

tests.title: Mid-term Mathematics Exam
tests.description: Comprehensive test covering algebra and basic geometry concepts.

tests.title: Weekly Quiz - Quadratic Equations
tests.description: Quick assessment on quadratic equations and their applications.

classrooms.CRDescription: Advanced English literature course focusing on classic and contemporary works, poetry analysis, and creative writing for 12th grade students.

posts.title: Welcome to English Literature
posts.content: This year we'll explore works by Shakespeare, Wordsworth, and modern Indian authors. Exciting journey ahead!
posts.author: Rajesh Kumar

posts.title: Reading List Updated
posts.content: Please download the updated reading list from the assignments section. New books added for this semester.
posts.author: Rajesh Kumar

assignments.title: Shakespeare Essay - Hamlet Analysis
assignments.description: Write a 1500-word essay analyzing the character development of Hamlet. Focus on his psychological journey.

assignments.title: Poetry Recitation
assignments.description: Memorize and recite any poem by William Wordsworth. Video submission required.

assignments.title: Creative Writing - Short Story
assignments.description: Write an original short story (800-1000 words) on the theme of 'friendship'.

tests.title: Literature Comprehension Test
tests.description: Test on Shakespeare's plays and Romantic poetry comprehension.
